meanings.definition: The action or fact of forming a united whole.
meanings.sent1: The cohesions of the team were evident during the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The cohesions of the ingredients in the recipe are crucial for a successful dish.
meanings.sent3: The cohesions of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent4: The cohesions of the community were like a tightly woven fabric.
meanings.sent5: The cohesions of the magnets created a strong bond.

meanings.definition: The action or property of sticking together.
meanings.sent1: The cohesions of the glue kept the pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The cohesions of the fabric made it durable.
meanings.sent3: The cohesions of the stickers made them hard to remove.
meanings.sent4: The cohesions of the friendship were unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The cohesions of the molecules formed a solid structure.

meanings.definition: The state of cohering or sticking together.
meanings.sent1: The cohesions of the ice made it difficult to separate the cubes.
meanings.sent2: The cohesions of the band members were evident in their harmonious performance.
meanings.sent3: The cohesions of the speech were so strong that everyone was moved.
meanings.sent4: The cohesions of the family were like the roots of a tree, keeping them grounded.
meanings.sent5: The cohesions of the fabric created a seamless design.
